joehung302 wrote:
> I was not able to recover a job from a previous checkpoint. Here is
> the error message. Any suggestions?

Was the 'previous checkpoint' not a 'fast checkpoint'?  How did you 
instantiate the recovery?  Via the UI?

Does the listing of bdbje logs under the recovered state directory match 
the content of the checkpoints bdbje-log-manifest.txt?  (Set the 
pause-at-start to true so that you can catch the crawler before it 
starts to make new progress).

Thanks Joe,
St.Ack

>
> cheers,
> -joe
